"C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\8.1\bin\x86\signtool.exe" sign /sha1 075BD1CAB5AE085E523AF7883FC0A8127BE08C71 /n "uvnc bvba" /v /fd sha1 /t http://timestamp.verisign.com/scripts/timstamp.dll "$(OutDir)$(TargetName)$(TargetExt)"
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\8.1\bin\x86\signtool.exe" sign /sha1 0F96782496EA96F2BA96CF177E61F993CA5BC2E8 /n "uvnc bvba" /v /as /fd sha256 /tr http://timestamp.geotrust.com/tsa "$(OutDir)$(TargetName)$(TargetExt)"
